channel.title: [PI] Dialogue Button Help
channel.description:
Basically,
Begin with clicking a NPC
Dialogue comes up asking where they would like to go
Option A Option B come up...
Can somebody tell me how i can get actions to work when clicking an option. For example, Option A is clicked, the player 500 gold and teleports to a gold mine.
Cheers
